UserCreationFlags

<<enum>>

PERSONAL_DATA = 1,

CONTACT = 2,

CREDENTIALS = 4,

GAME_STATE = 8

STATISTICS = 16

This enum is supposed
to be used as flags for
retrieval of users from
database. Determines
which parts of user
profile should be retrived.
